name: XWUI Context Menu Component
description: Right-click context menu component. Displays a menu when user right-clicks on a target element. Supports menu items with icons, separators, and nested menus. Uses XWUIMenuDropdown internally.

conf_comp.title: Component Configuration (conf_comp)
conf_comp.description: Component-specific settings set when initializing the component

className.description: Additional CSS class name for the context menu

data.title: Component Data
data.description: Data to update the component, set when initializing the component

items.description: Array of menu items to display in the context menu
Dropdown menu item (see XWUIMenuDropdown schema for structure)

targetElement.description: Target element or selector string to attach the context menu to
